Title: Tightly Knotted to a Similar String
Writer: Lucy Maud Montgomery (novel), Antonio Ranieri (script coordinator), Moira Walley-Beckett (created by), Moira Walley-Beckett
Actors: Amybeth McNulty, Geraldine James, R.H. Thomson, Dalila Bela
Plot: Anne is allowed to ask her best friend Dianna over for afternoon tea, things start to go wrong when she looks for the Raspberry Cordial.
